4281  if (cur_match_len < TDEFL_MIN_MATCH_LEN)
4282  cur_match_len = 0;
4283  else
4284  cur_match_dist = 1;
4285  }
4286  }
4287  else {
4288  tdefl_find_match(d, d->m_lookahead_pos, d->m_dict_size,
4289  d->m_lookahead_size, &cur_match_dist, &cur_match_len);
4290  }
4291  if (((cur_match_len == TDEFL_MIN_MATCH_LEN) &&
4292  (cur_match_dist >= 8U * 1024U)) ||
4293  (cur_pos == cur_match_dist) ||
4294  ((d->m_flags & TDEFL_FILTER_MATCHES) && (cur_match_len <= 5))) {
4295  cur_match_dist = cur_match_len = 0;
4296  }
4297  if (d->m_saved_match_len) {
4298  if (cur_match_len > d->m_saved_match_len) {
4299  tdefl_record_literal(d, (mz_uint8)d->m_saved_lit);
4300  if (cur_match_len >= 128) {
4301  tdefl_record_match(d, cur_match_len, cur_match_dist);
4302  d->m_saved_match_len = 0;
4303  len_to_move = cur_match_len;
4304  }
4305  else {
4306  d->m_saved_lit = d->m_dict[cur_pos];
4307  d->m_saved_match_dist = cur_match_dist;
4308  d->m_saved_match_len = cur_match_len;
4309  }
4310  }
4311  else {
4312  tdefl_record_match(d, d->m_saved_match_len, d->m_saved_match_dist);
4313  len_to_move = d->m_saved_match_len - 1;
4314  d->m_saved_match_len = 0;
4315  }
4316  }
4317  else if (!cur_match_dist)
4318  tdefl_record_literal(d,
4319  d->m_dict[MZ_MIN(cur_pos, sizeof(d->m_dict) - 1)]);
4320  else if ((d->m_greedy_parsing) || (d->m_flags & TDEFL_RLE_MATCHES) ||
4321  (cur_match_len >= 128)) {
4322  tdefl_record_match(d, cur_match_len, cur_match_dist);
4323  len_to_move = cur_match_len;
4324  }
4325  else {
4326  d->m_saved_lit = d->m_dict[MZ_MIN(cur_pos, sizeof(d->m_dict) - 1)];
4327  d->m_saved_match_dist = cur_match_dist;
4328  d->m_saved_match_len = cur_match_len;
4329  }
4330  // Move the lookahead forward by len_to_move bytes.
4331  d->m_lookahead_pos += len_to_move;
4332  MZ_ASSERT(d->m_lookahead_size >= len_to_move);
4333  d->m_lookahead_size -= len_to_move;
4334  d->m_dict_size =
4335  MZ_MIN(d->m_dict_size + len_to_move, (mz_uint)TDEFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE);
4336  // Check if it's time to flush the current LZ codes to the internal output
4337  // buffer.
4338  if ((d->m_pLZ_code_buf > &d->m_lz_code_buf[TDEFL_LZ_CODE_BUF_SIZE - 8]) ||
4339  ((d->m_total_lz_bytes > 31 * 1024) &&
4340  (((((mz_uint)(d->m_pLZ_code_buf - d->m_lz_code_buf) * 115) >> 7) >=
4341  d->m_total_lz_bytes) ||
4342  (d->m_flags & TDEFL_FORCE_ALL_RAW_BLOCKS)))) {
4343  int n;
4344  d->m_pSrc = pSrc;
4345  d->m_src_buf_left = src_buf_left;
4346  if ((n = tdefl_flush_block(d, 0)) != 0)
4347  return (n < 0) ? MZ_FALSE : MZ_TRUE;
4348  }
4349  }
4350 
4351  d->m_pSrc = pSrc;
4352  d->m_src_buf_left = src_buf_left;
4353  return MZ_TRUE;
4354  }
4355 
4356  static tdefl_status tdefl_flush_output_buffer(tdefl_compressor *d) {
4357  if (d->m_pIn_buf_size) {
4358  *d->m_pIn_buf_size = d->m_pSrc - (const mz_uint8 *)d->m_pIn_buf;
4359  }
4360 
4361  if (d->m_pOut_buf_size) {
4362  size_t n = MZ_MIN(*d->m_pOut_buf_size - d->m_out_buf_ofs,
4363  d->m_output_flush_remaining);
4364  memcpy((mz_uint8 *)d->m_pOut_buf + d->m_out_buf_ofs,
4365  d->m_output_buf + d->m_output_flush_ofs, n);
4366  d->m_output_flush_ofs += (mz_uint)n;
4367  d->m_output_flush_remaining -= (mz_uint)n;
4368  d->m_out_buf_ofs += n;
4369 
4370  *d->m_pOut_buf_size = d->m_out_buf_ofs;
4371  }
4372 
4373  return (d->m_finished && !d->m_output_flush_remaining) ? TDEFL_STATUS_DONE
4374  : TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY;
4375  }
4376 
4377  tdefl_status tdefl_compress(tdefl_compressor *d, const void *pIn_buf,
4378  size_t *pIn_buf_size, void *pOut_buf,
4379  size_t *pOut_buf_size, tdefl_flush flush) {
4380  if (!d) {
4381  if (pIn_buf_size) *pIn_buf_size = 0;
4382  if (pOut_buf_size) *pOut_buf_size = 0;
4383  return TDEFL_STATUS_BAD_PARAM;
4384  }
4385 
4386  d->m_pIn_buf = pIn_buf;
4387  d->m_pIn_buf_size = pIn_buf_size;
4388  d->m_pOut_buf = pOut_buf;
4389  d->m_pOut_buf_size = pOut_buf_size;
4390  d->m_pSrc = (const mz_uint8 *)(pIn_buf);
4391  d->m_src_buf_left = pIn_buf_size ? *pIn_buf_size : 0;
4392  d->m_out_buf_ofs = 0;
4393  d->m_flush = flush;
4394 
4395  if (((d->m_pPut_buf_func != NULL) ==
4396  ((pOut_buf != NULL) || (pOut_buf_size != NULL))) ||
4397  (d->m_prev_return_status != TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY) ||
4398  (d->m_wants_to_finish && (flush != TDEFL_FINISH)) ||
4399  (pIn_buf_size && *pIn_buf_size && !pIn_buf) ||
4400  (pOut_buf_size && *pOut_buf_size && !pOut_buf)) {
4401  if (pIn_buf_size) *pIn_buf_size = 0;
4402  if (pOut_buf_size) *pOut_buf_size = 0;
4403  return (d->m_prev_return_status = TDEFL_STATUS_BAD_PARAM);
4404  }
4405  d->m_wants_to_finish |= (flush == TDEFL_FINISH);
4406 
4407  if ((d->m_output_flush_remaining) || (d->m_finished))
4408  return (d->m_prev_return_status = tdefl_flush_output_buffer(d));
4409 
4410 #if MINIZ_USE_UNALIGNED_LOADS_AND_STORES && MINIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN
4411  if (((d->m_flags & TDEFL_MAX_PROBES_MASK) == 1) &&
4412  ((d->m_flags & TDEFL_GREEDY_PARSING_FLAG) != 0) &&
4413  ((d->m_flags & (TDEFL_FILTER_MATCHES | TDEFL_FORCE_ALL_RAW_BLOCKS |
4414  TDEFL_RLE_MATCHES)) == 0)) {
4415  if (!tdefl_compress_fast(d)) return d->m_prev_return_status;
4416  }
4417  else
4418 #endif // #if MINIZ_USE_UNALIGNED_LOADS_AND_STORES && MINIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN
4419  {
4420  if (!tdefl_compress_normal(d)) return d->m_prev_return_status;
4421  }
4422 
4423  if ((d->m_flags & (TDEFL_WRITE_ZLIB_HEADER | TDEFL_COMPUTE_ADLER32)) &&
4424  (pIn_buf))
4425  d->m_adler32 =
4426  (mz_uint32)mz_adler32(d->m_adler32, (const mz_uint8 *)pIn_buf,
4427  d->m_pSrc - (const mz_uint8 *)pIn_buf);
4428 
4429  if ((flush) && (!d->m_lookahead_size) && (!d->m_src_buf_left) &&
4430  (!d->m_output_flush_remaining)) {
4431  if (tdefl_flush_block(d, flush) < 0) return d->m_prev_return_status;
4432  d->m_finished = (flush == TDEFL_FINISH);
4433  if (flush == TDEFL_FULL_FLUSH) {
4434  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(d->m_hash);
4435  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(d->m_next);
4436  d->m_dict_size = 0;
4437  }
4438  }
4439 
4440  return (d->m_prev_return_status = tdefl_flush_output_buffer(d));
4441  }
4442 
4443  tdefl_status tdefl_compress_buffer(tdefl_compressor *d, const void *pIn_buf,
4444  size_t in_buf_size, tdefl_flush flush) {
4445  MZ_ASSERT(d->m_pPut_buf_func);
4446  return tdefl_compress(d, pIn_buf, &in_buf_size, NULL, NULL, flush);
4447  }
4448 
4449  tdefl_status tdefl_init(tdefl_compressor *d,
4450  tdefl_put_buf_func_ptr pPut_buf_func,
4451  void *pPut_buf_user, int flags) {
4452  d->m_pPut_buf_func = pPut_buf_func;
4453  d->m_pPut_buf_user = pPut_buf_user;
4454  d->m_flags = (mz_uint)(flags);
4455  d->m_max_probes[0] = 1 + ((flags & 0xFFF) + 2) / 3;
4456  d->m_greedy_parsing = (flags & TDEFL_GREEDY_PARSING_FLAG) != 0;
4457  d->m_max_probes[1] = 1 + (((flags & 0xFFF) >> 2) + 2) / 3;
4458  if (!(flags & TDEFL_NONDETERMINISTIC_PARSING_FLAG)) MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(d->m_hash);
4459  d->m_lookahead_pos = d->m_lookahead_size = d->m_dict_size =
4460  d->m_total_lz_bytes = d->m_lz_code_buf_dict_pos = d->m_bits_in = 0;
4461  d->m_output_flush_ofs = d->m_output_flush_remaining = d->m_finished =
4462  d->m_block_index = d->m_bit_buffer = d->m_wants_to_finish = 0;
4463  d->m_pLZ_code_buf = d->m_lz_code_buf + 1;
4464  d->m_pLZ_flags = d->m_lz_code_buf;
4465  d->m_num_flags_left = 8;
4466  d->m_pOutput_buf = d->m_output_buf;
4467  d->m_pOutput_buf_end = d->m_output_buf;
4468  d->m_prev_return_status = TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY;
4469  d->m_saved_match_dist = d->m_saved_match_len = d->m_saved_lit = 0;
4470  d->m_adler32 = 1;
4471  d->m_pIn_buf = NULL;
4472  d->m_pOut_buf = NULL;
4473  d->m_pIn_buf_size = NULL;
4474  d->m_pOut_buf_size = NULL;
4475  d->m_flush = TDEFL_NO_FLUSH;
4476  d->m_pSrc = NULL;
4477  d->m_src_buf_left = 0;
4478  d->m_out_buf_ofs = 0;
4479  memset(&d->m_huff_count[0][0], 0,
4480  sizeof(d->m_huff_count[0][0]) * TDEFL_MAX_HUFF_SYMBOLS_0);
4481  memset(&d->m_huff_count[1][0], 0,
4482  sizeof(d->m_huff_count[1][0]) * TDEFL_MAX_HUFF_SYMBOLS_1);
4483  return TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY;
4484  }
4485 
4486  tdefl_status tdefl_get_prev_return_status(tdefl_compressor *d) {
4487  return d->m_prev_return_status;
4488  }
4489 
4490  mz_uint32 tdefl_get_adler32(tdefl_compressor *d) { return d->m_adler32; }
4491 
4492  mz_bool tdefl_compress_mem_to_output(const void *pBuf, size_t buf_len,
4493  tdefl_put_buf_func_ptr pPut_buf_func,
4494  void *pPut_buf_user, int flags) {
4495  tdefl_compressor *pComp;
4496  mz_bool succeeded;
4497  if (((buf_len) && (!pBuf)) || (!pPut_buf_func)) return MZ_FALSE;
4498  pComp = (tdefl_compressor *)MZ_MALLOC(sizeof(tdefl_compressor));
4499  if (!pComp) return MZ_FALSE;
4500  succeeded = (tdefl_init(pComp, pPut_buf_func, pPut_buf_user, flags) ==
4501  TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY);
4502  succeeded =
4503  succeeded && (tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp, pBuf, buf_len, TDEFL_FINISH) ==
4504  TDEFL_STATUS_DONE);
4505  MZ_FREE(pComp);
4506  return succeeded;
4507  }
4508 
4509  typedef struct {
4510  size_t m_size, m_capacity;
4511  mz_uint8 *m_pBuf;
4512  mz_bool m_expandable;
4513  } tdefl_output_buffer;
4514 
4515  static mz_bool tdefl_output_buffer_putter(const void *pBuf, int len,
4516  void *pUser) {
4517  tdefl_output_buffer *p = (tdefl_output_buffer *)pUser;
4518  size_t new_size = p->m_size + len;
4519  if (new_size > p->m_capacity) {
4520  size_t new_capacity = p->m_capacity;
4521  mz_uint8 *pNew_buf;
4522  if (!p->m_expandable) return MZ_FALSE;
4523  do {
4524  new_capacity = MZ_MAX(128U, new_capacity << 1U);
4525  } while (new_size > new_capacity);
4526  pNew_buf = (mz_uint8 *)MZ_REALLOC(p->m_pBuf, new_capacity);
4527  if (!pNew_buf) return MZ_FALSE;
4528  p->m_pBuf = pNew_buf;
4529  p->m_capacity = new_capacity;
4530  }
4531  memcpy((mz_uint8 *)p->m_pBuf + p->m_size, pBuf, len);
4532  p->m_size = new_size;
4533  return MZ_TRUE;
4534  }
4535 
4536  void *tdefl_compress_mem_to_heap(const void *pSrc_buf, size_t src_buf_len,
4537  size_t *pOut_len, int flags) {
4538  tdefl_output_buffer out_buf;
4539  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(out_buf);
4540  if (!pOut_len)
4541  return MZ_FALSE;
4542  else
4543  *pOut_len = 0;
4544  out_buf.m_expandable = MZ_TRUE;
4545  if (!tdefl_compress_mem_to_output(
4546  pSrc_buf, src_buf_len, tdefl_output_buffer_putter, &out_buf, flags))
4547  return NULL;
4548  *pOut_len = out_buf.m_size;
4549  return out_buf.m_pBuf;
4550  }
4551 
4552  size_t tdefl_compress_mem_to_mem(void *pOut_buf, size_t out_buf_len,
4553  const void *pSrc_buf, size_t src_buf_len,
4554  int flags) {
4555  tdefl_output_buffer out_buf;
4556  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(out_buf);
4557  if (!pOut_buf) return 0;
4558  out_buf.m_pBuf = (mz_uint8 *)pOut_buf;
4559  out_buf.m_capacity = out_buf_len;
4560  if (!tdefl_compress_mem_to_output(
4561  pSrc_buf, src_buf_len, tdefl_output_buffer_putter, &out_buf, flags))
4562  return 0;
4563  return out_buf.m_size;
4564  }
4565 
4566 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ZLIB_APIS
4567  static const mz_uint s_tdefl_num_probes[11] = { 0, 1, 6, 32, 16, 32,
4568  128, 256, 512, 768, 1500 };
4569 
4570  // level may actually range from [0,10] (10 is a "hidden" max level, where we
4571  // want a bit more compression and it's fine if throughput to fall off a cliff
4572  // on some files).
4573  mz_uint tdefl_create_comp_flags_from_zip_params(int level, int window_bits,
4574  int strategy) {
4575  mz_uint comp_flags =
4576  s_tdefl_num_probes[(level >= 0) ? MZ_MIN(10, level) : MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL] |
4577  ((level <= 3) ? TDEFL_GREEDY_PARSING_FLAG : 0);
4578  if (window_bits > 0) comp_flags |= TDEFL_WRITE_ZLIB_HEADER;
4579 
4580  if (!level)
4581  comp_flags |= TDEFL_FORCE_ALL_RAW_BLOCKS;
4582  else if (strategy == MZ_FILTERED)
4583  comp_flags |= TDEFL_FILTER_MATCHES;
4584  else if (strategy == MZ_HUFFMAN_ONLY)
4585  comp_flags &= ~TDEFL_MAX_PROBES_MASK;
4586  else if (strategy == MZ_FIXED)
4587  comp_flags |= TDEFL_FORCE_ALL_STATIC_BLOCKS;
4588  else if (strategy == MZ_RLE)
4589  comp_flags |= TDEFL_RLE_MATCHES;
4590 
4591  return comp_flags;
4592  }
4593 #endif // MINIZ_NO_ZLIB_APIS
4594 
4595 #ifdef _MSC_VER
4596 #pragma warning(push)
4597 #pragma warning(disable : 4204) // nonstandard extension used : non-constant
4598  // aggregate initializer (also supported by GNU
4599  // C and C99, so no big deal)
4600 #pragma warning(disable : 4244) // 'initializing': conversion from '__int64' to
4601  // 'int', possible loss of data
4602 #pragma warning(disable : 4267) // 'argument': conversion from '__int64' to
4603  // 'int', possible loss of data
4604 #pragma warning(disable : 4996) // 'strdup': The POSIX name for this item is
4605  // deprecated. Instead, use the ISO C and C++
4606  // conformant name: _strdup.
4607 #endif
4608 
4609 // Simple PNG writer function by Alex Evans, 2011. Released into the public
4610 // domain: https://gist.github.com/908299, more context at
4611 // http://altdevblogaday.org/2011/04/06/a-smaller-jpg-encoder/.
4612 // This is actually a modification of Alex's original code so PNG files
4613 // generated by this function pass pngcheck.
4614  void *tdefl_write_image_to_png_file_in_memory_ex(const void *pImage, int w,
4615  int h, int num_chans,
4616  size_t *pLen_out,
4617  mz_uint level, mz_bool flip) {
4618  // Using a local copy of this array here in case MINIZ_NO_ZLIB_APIS was
4619  // defined.
4620  static const mz_uint s_tdefl_png_num_probes[11] = {
4621  0, 1, 6, 32, 16, 32, 128, 256, 512, 768, 1500 };
4622  tdefl_compressor *pComp =
4623  (tdefl_compressor *)MZ_MALLOC(sizeof(tdefl_compressor));
4624  tdefl_output_buffer out_buf;
4625  int i, bpl = w * num_chans, y, z;
4626  mz_uint32 c;
4627  *pLen_out = 0;
4628  if (!pComp) return NULL;
4629  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(out_buf);
4630  out_buf.m_expandable = MZ_TRUE;
4631  out_buf.m_capacity = 57 + MZ_MAX(64, (1 + bpl) * h);
4632  if (NULL == (out_buf.m_pBuf = (mz_uint8 *)MZ_MALLOC(out_buf.m_capacity))) {
4633  MZ_FREE(pComp);
4634  return NULL;
4635  }
4636  // write dummy header
4637  for (z = 41; z; --z) tdefl_output_buffer_putter(&z, 1, &out_buf);
4638  // compress image data
4639  tdefl_init(
4640  pComp, tdefl_output_buffer_putter, &out_buf,
4641  s_tdefl_png_num_probes[MZ_MIN(10, level)] | TDEFL_WRITE_ZLIB_HEADER);
4642  for (y = 0; y < h; ++y) {
4643  tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp, &z, 1, TDEFL_NO_FLUSH);
4644  tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp,
4645  (mz_uint8 *)pImage + (flip ? (h - 1 - y) : y) * bpl,
4646  bpl, TDEFL_NO_FLUSH);
4647  }
4648  if (tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp, NULL, 0, TDEFL_FINISH) !=
4649  TDEFL_STATUS_DONE) {
4650  MZ_FREE(pComp);
4651  MZ_FREE(out_buf.m_pBuf);
4652  return NULL;
4653  }
4654  // write real header
4655  *pLen_out = out_buf.m_size - 41;
4656  {
4657  static const mz_uint8 chans[] = { 0x00, 0x00, 0x04, 0x02, 0x06 };
4658  mz_uint8 pnghdr[41] = { 0x89,
4659  0x50,
4660  0x4e,
4661  0x47,
4662  0x0d,
4663  0x0a,
4664  0x1a,
4665  0x0a,
4666  0x00,
4667  0x00,
4668  0x00,
4669  0x0d,
4670  0x49,
4671  0x48,
4672  0x44,
4673  0x52,
4674  0,
4675  0,
4676  (mz_uint8)(w >> 8),
4677  (mz_uint8)w,
4678  0,
4679  0,
4680  (mz_uint8)(h >> 8),
4681  (mz_uint8)h,
4682  8,
4683  chans[num_chans],
4684  0,
4685  0,
4686  0,
4687  0,
4688  0,
4689  0,
4690  0,
4691  (mz_uint8)(*pLen_out >> 24),
4692  (mz_uint8)(*pLen_out >> 16),
4693  (mz_uint8)(*pLen_out >> 8),
4694  (mz_uint8)*pLen_out,
4695  0x49,
4696  0x44,
4697  0x41,
4698  0x54 };
4699  c = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, pnghdr + 12, 17);
4700  for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i, c <<= 8)
4701  ((mz_uint8 *)(pnghdr + 29))[i] = (mz_uint8)(c >> 24);
4702  memcpy(out_buf.m_pBuf, pnghdr, 41);
4703  }
4704  // write footer (IDAT CRC-32, followed by IEND chunk)
4705  if (!tdefl_output_buffer_putter(
4706  "\0\0\0\0\0\0\0\0\x49\x45\x4e\x44\xae\x42\x60\x82", 16, &out_buf)) {
4707  *pLen_out = 0;
4708  MZ_FREE(pComp);
4709  MZ_FREE(out_buf.m_pBuf);
4710  return NULL;
4711  }
4712  c = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, out_buf.m_pBuf + 41 - 4,
4713  *pLen_out + 4);
4714  for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i, c <<= 8)
4715  (out_buf.m_pBuf + out_buf.m_size - 16)[i] = (mz_uint8)(c >> 24);
4716  // compute final size of file, grab compressed data buffer and return
4717  *pLen_out += 57;
4718  MZ_FREE(pComp);
4719  return out_buf.m_pBuf;
4720  }
4721  void *tdefl_write_image_to_png_file_in_memory(const void *pImage, int w, int h,
4722  int num_chans, size_t *pLen_out) {
4723  // Level 6 corresponds to TDEFL_DEFAULT_MAX_PROBES or MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL (but we
4724  // can't depend on MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL being available in case the zlib API's
4725  // where #defined out)
4726  return tdefl_write_image_to_png_file_in_memory_ex(pImage, w, h, num_chans,
4727  pLen_out, 6, MZ_FALSE);
4728  }
4729 
4730  // ------------------- .ZIP archive reading
4731 
4732 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ARCHIVE_APIS
4733 #error "No arvhive APIs"
4734 
4735 #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4736 #define MZ_FILE void *
4737 #else
4738 #include <stdio.h>
4739 #include <sys/stat.h>
4740 
4741 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__MINGW64__)
4742  static FILE *mz_fopen(const char *pFilename, const char *pMode) {
4743  FILE *pFile = NULL;
4744  fopen_s(&pFile, pFilename, pMode);
4745  return pFile;
4746  }
4747  static FILE *mz_freopen(const char *pPath, const char *pMode, FILE *pStream) {
4748  FILE *pFile = NULL;
4749  if (freopen_s(&pFile, pPath, pMode, pStream)) return NULL;
4750  return pFile;
4751  }
4752 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4753 #include <sys/utime.h>
4754 #endif
4755 #define MZ_FILE FILE
4756 #define MZ_FOPEN mz_fopen
4757 #define MZ_FCLOSE fclose
4758 #define MZ_FREAD fread
4759 #define MZ_FWRITE fwrite
4760 #define MZ_FTELL64 _ftelli64
4761 #define MZ_FSEEK64 _fseeki64
4762 #define MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT _stat
4763 #define MZ_FILE_STAT _stat
4764 #define MZ_FFLUSH fflush
4765 #define MZ_FREOPEN mz_freopen
4766 #define MZ_DELETE_FILE remove
4767 #elif defined(__MINGW32__)
4768 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4769 #include <sys/utime.h>
4770 #endif
4771 #define MZ_FILE FILE
4772 #define MZ_FOPEN(f, m) fopen(f, m)
4773 #define MZ_FCLOSE fclose
4774 #define MZ_FREAD fread
4775 #define MZ_FWRITE fwrite
4776 #define MZ_FTELL64 ftello64
4777 #define MZ_FSEEK64 fseeko64
4778 #define MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT _stat
4779 #define MZ_FILE_STAT _stat
4780 #define MZ_FFLUSH fflush
4781 #define MZ_FREOPEN(f, m, s) freopen(f, m, s)
4782 #define MZ_DELETE_FILE remove
4783 #elif defined(__TINYC__)
4784 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4785 #include <sys/utime.h>
4786 #endif
4787 #define MZ_FILE FILE
4788 #define MZ_FOPEN(f, m) fopen(f, m)
4789 #define MZ_FCLOSE fclose
4790 #define MZ_FREAD fread
4791 #define MZ_FWRITE fwrite
4792 #define MZ_FTELL64 ftell
4793 #define MZ_FSEEK64 fseek
4794 #define MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT stat
4795 #define MZ_FILE_STAT stat
4796 #define MZ_FFLUSH fflush
4797 #define MZ_FREOPEN(f, m, s) freopen(f, m, s)
4798 #define MZ_DELETE_FILE remove
4799 #elif defined(__GNUC__) && defined(_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE) && _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE
4800 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4801 #include <utime.h>
4802 #endif
4803 #define MZ_FILE FILE
4804 #define MZ_FOPEN(f, m) fopen64(f, m)
4805 #define MZ_FCLOSE fclose
4806 #define MZ_FREAD fread
4807 #define MZ_FWRITE fwrite
4808 #define MZ_FTELL64 ftello64
4809 #define MZ_FSEEK64 fseeko64
4810 #define MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT stat64
4811 #define MZ_FILE_STAT stat64
4812 #define MZ_FFLUSH fflush
4813 #define MZ_FREOPEN(p, m, s) freopen64(p, m, s)
4814 #define MZ_DELETE_FILE remove
4815 #else
4816 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4817 #include <utime.h>
4818 #endif
4819 #define MZ_FILE FILE
4820 #define MZ_FOPEN(f, m) fopen(f, m)
4821 #define MZ_FCLOSE fclose
4822 #define MZ_FREAD fread
4823 #define MZ_FWRITE fwrite
4824 #define MZ_FTELL64 ftello
4825 #define MZ_FSEEK64 fseeko
4826 #define MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT stat
4827 #define MZ_FILE_STAT stat
4828 #define MZ_FFLUSH fflush
4829 #define MZ_FREOPEN(f, m, s) freopen(f, m, s)
4830 #define MZ_DELETE_FILE remove
4831 #endif // #ifdef _MSC_VER
4832 #endif // #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4833 
4834 #define MZ_TOLOWER(c) ((((c) >= 'A') && ((c) <= 'Z')) ? ((c) - 'A' + 'a') : (c))
4835 
4836 // Various ZIP archive enums. To completely avoid cross platform compiler
4837 // alignment and platform endian issues, miniz.c doesn't use structs for any of
4838 // this stuff.
4839  enum {
4840  // ZIP archive identifiers and record sizes
4841  MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG = 0x06054b50,
4842  MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG = 0x02014b50,
4843  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG = 0x04034b50,
4844  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE = 30,
4845  MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE = 46,
4846  MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE = 22,
4847  // Central directory header record offsets
4848  MZ_ZIP_CDH_SIG_OFS = 0,
4849  MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_MADE_BY_OFS = 4,
4850  MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS = 6,
4851  MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS = 8,
4852  MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS = 10,
4853  MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_TIME_OFS = 12,
4854  MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_DATE_OFS = 14,
4855  MZ_ZIP_CDH_CRC32_OFS = 16,
4856  MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS = 20,
4857  MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS = 24,
4858  MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS = 28,
4859  MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS = 30,
4860  MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS = 32,
4861  MZ_ZIP_CDH_DISK_START_OFS = 34,
4862  MZ_ZIP_CDH_INTERNAL_ATTR_OFS = 36,
4863  MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS = 38,
4864  MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS = 42,
4865  // Local directory header offsets
4866  MZ_ZIP_LDH_SIG_OFS = 0,
4867  MZ_ZIP_LDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS = 4,
4868  MZ_ZIP_LDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS = 6,
4869  MZ_ZIP_LDH_METHOD_OFS = 8,
4870  MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_TIME_OFS = 10,
4871  MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_DATE_OFS = 12,
4872  MZ_ZIP_LDH_CRC32_OFS = 14,
4873  MZ_ZIP_LDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS = 18,
4874  MZ_ZIP_LDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS = 22,
4875  MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS = 26,
4876  MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS = 28,
4877  // End of central directory offsets
4878  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_SIG_OFS = 0,
4879  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_THIS_DISK_OFS = 4,
4880  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_DISK_CDIR_OFS = 6,
4881  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_NUM_ENTRIES_ON_DISK_OFS = 8,
4882  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_TOTAL_ENTRIES_OFS = 10,
4883  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_SIZE_OFS = 12,
4884  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_OFS_OFS = 16,
4885  MZ_ZIP_ECDH_COMMENT_SIZE_OFS = 20,
4886  };
4887 
4888  typedef struct {
4889  void *m_p;
4890  size_t m_size, m_capacity;
4891  mz_uint m_element_size;
4892  } mz_zip_array;
4893 
4894  struct mz_zip_internal_state_tag {
4895  mz_zip_array m_central_dir;
4896  mz_zip_array m_central_dir_offsets;
4897  mz_zip_array m_sorted_central_dir_offsets;
4898  MZ_FILE *m_pFile;
4899  void *m_pMem;
4900  size_t m_mem_size;
4901  size_t m_mem_capacity;
4902  };
4903 
4904 #define MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(array_ptr, element_size) \
4905  (array_ptr)->m_element_size = element_size
4906 #define MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(array_ptr, element_type, index) \
4907  ((element_type *)((array_ptr)->m_p))[index]
4908 
4909  static MZ_FORCEINLINE void mz_zip_array_clear(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4910  mz_zip_array *pArray) {
4911  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pArray->m_p);
4912  memset(pArray, 0, sizeof(mz_zip_array));
4913  }
4914 
4915  static mz_bool mz_zip_array_ensure_capacity(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4916  mz_zip_array *pArray,
4917  size_t min_new_capacity,
4918  mz_uint growing) {
4919  void *pNew_p;
4920  size_t new_capacity = min_new_capacity;
4921  MZ_ASSERT(pArray->m_element_size);
4922  if (pArray->m_capacity >= min_new_capacity) return MZ_TRUE;
4923  if (growing) {
4924  new_capacity = MZ_MAX(1, pArray->m_capacity);
4925  while (new_capacity < min_new_capacity) new_capacity *= 2;
4926  }
4927  if (NULL == (pNew_p = pZip->m_pRealloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pArray->m_p,
4928  pArray->m_element_size, new_capacity)))
4929  return MZ_FALSE;
4930  pArray->m_p = pNew_p;
4931  pArray->m_capacity = new_capacity;
4932  return MZ_TRUE;
4933  }
4934 
4935  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_array_reserve(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4936  mz_zip_array *pArray,
4937  size_t new_capacity,
4938  mz_uint growing) {
4939  if (new_capacity > pArray->m_capacity) {
4940  if (!mz_zip_array_ensure_capacity(pZip, pArray, new_capacity, growing))
4941  return MZ_FALSE;
4942  }
4943  return MZ_TRUE;
4944  }
4945 
4946  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_array_resize(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4947  mz_zip_array *pArray,
4948  size_t new_size,
4949  mz_uint growing) {
4950  if (new_size > pArray->m_capacity) {
4951  if (!mz_zip_array_ensure_capacity(pZip, pArray, new_size, growing))
4952  return MZ_FALSE;
4953  }
4954  pArray->m_size = new_size;
4955  return MZ_TRUE;
4956  }
4957 
4958  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_array_ensure_room(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4959  mz_zip_array *pArray,
4960  size_t n) {
4961  return mz_zip_array_reserve(pZip, pArray, pArray->m_size + n, MZ_TRUE);
4962  }
4963 
4964  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_array_push_back(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
4965  mz_zip_array *pArray,
4966  const void *pElements,
4967  size_t n) {
4968  size_t orig_size = pArray->m_size;
4969  if (!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, pArray, orig_size + n, MZ_TRUE))
4970  return MZ_FALSE;
4971  memcpy((mz_uint8 *)pArray->m_p + orig_size * pArray->m_element_size,
4972  pElements, n * pArray->m_element_size);
4973  return MZ_TRUE;
4974  }
4975 
4976 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4977  static time_t mz_zip_dos_to_time_t(int dos_time, int dos_date) {
4978  struct tm tm;
4979  memset(&tm, 0, sizeof(tm));
4980  tm.tm_isdst = -1;
4981  tm.tm_year = ((dos_date >> 9) & 127) + 1980 - 1900;
4982  tm.tm_mon = ((dos_date >> 5) & 15) - 1;
4983  tm.tm_mday = dos_date & 31;
4984  tm.tm_hour = (dos_time >> 11) & 31;
4985  tm.tm_min = (dos_time >> 5) & 63;
4986  tm.tm_sec = (dos_time << 1) & 62;
4987  return mktime(&tm);
4988  }
4989 
4990  static void mz_zip_time_to_dos_time(time_t time, mz_uint16 *pDOS_time,
4991  mz_uint16 *pDOS_date) {
4992 #ifdef _MSC_VER
4993  struct tm tm_struct;
4994  struct tm *tm = &tm_struct;
4995  errno_t err = localtime_s(tm, &time);
4996  if (err) {
4997  *pDOS_date = 0;
4998  *pDOS_time = 0;
4999  return;
5000  }
5001 #else
5002  struct tm *tm = localtime(&time);
5003 #endif
5004  *pDOS_time = (mz_uint16)(((tm->tm_hour) << 11) + ((tm->tm_min) << 5) +
5005  ((tm->tm_sec) >> 1));
5006  *pDOS_date = (mz_uint16)(((tm->tm_year + 1900 - 1980) << 9) +
5007  ((tm->tm_mon + 1) << 5) + tm->tm_mday);
5008  }
5009 #endif
5010 
5011 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
5012  static mz_bool mz_zip_get_file_modified_time(const char *pFilename,
5013  mz_uint16 *pDOS_time,
5014  mz_uint16 *pDOS_date) {
5015 #ifdef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5016  (void)pFilename;
5017  *pDOS_date = *pDOS_time = 0;
5018 #else
5019  struct MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT file_stat;
5020  // On Linux with x86 glibc, this call will fail on large files (>= 0x80000000
5021  // bytes) unless you compiled with _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE. Argh.
5022  if (MZ_FILE_STAT(pFilename, &file_stat) != 0) return MZ_FALSE;
5023  mz_zip_time_to_dos_time(file_stat.st_mtime, pDOS_time, pDOS_date);
5024 #endif // #ifdef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5025  return MZ_TRUE;
5026  }
5027 
5028 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5029  static mz_bool mz_zip_set_file_times(const char *pFilename, time_t access_time,
5030  time_t modified_time) {
5031  struct utimbuf t;
5032  t.actime = access_time;
5033  t.modtime = modified_time;
5034  return !utime(pFilename, &t);
5035  }
5036 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5037 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
5038 
5039  static mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_internal(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5040  mz_uint32 flags) {
5041  (void)flags;
5042  if ((!pZip) || (pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID))
5043  return MZ_FALSE;
5044 
5045  if (!pZip->m_pAlloc) pZip->m_pAlloc = def_alloc_func;
5046  if (!pZip->m_pFree) pZip->m_pFree = def_free_func;
5047  if (!pZip->m_pRealloc) pZip->m_pRealloc = def_realloc_func;
5048 
5049  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING;
5050  pZip->m_archive_size = 0;
5051  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
5052  pZip->m_total_files = 0;
5053 
5054  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState = (mz_zip_internal_state *)pZip->m_pAlloc(
5055  pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state))))
5056  return MZ_FALSE;
5057  memset(pZip->m_pState, 0, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state));
5058  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir,
5059  sizeof(mz_uint8));
5060  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets,
5061  sizeof(mz_uint32));
5062  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets,
5063  sizeof(mz_uint32));
5064  return MZ_TRUE;
5065  }
5066 
5067  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool
5068  mz_zip_reader_filename_less(const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_array,
5069  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets,
5070  mz_uint l_index, mz_uint r_index) {
5071  const mz_uint8 *pL = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5072  pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8,
5073  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32,
5074  l_index)),
5075  *pE;
5076  const mz_uint8 *pR = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5077  pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8,
5078  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, r_index));
5079  mz_uint l_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pL + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS),
5080  r_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pR + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5081  mz_uint8 l = 0, r = 0;
5082  pL += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
5083  pR += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
5084  pE = pL + MZ_MIN(l_len, r_len);
5085  while (pL < pE) {
5086  if ((l = MZ_TOLOWER(*pL)) != (r = MZ_TOLOWER(*pR))) break;
5087  pL++;
5088  pR++;
5089  }
5090  return (pL == pE) ? (l_len < r_len) : (l < r);
5091  }
5092 
5093 #define MZ_SWAP_UINT32(a, b) \
5094  do { \
5095  mz_uint32 t = a; \
5096  a = b; \
5097  b = t; \
5098  } \
5099  MZ_MACRO_END
5100 
5101  // Heap sort of lowercased filenames, used to help accelerate plain central
5102  // directory searches by mz_zip_reader_locate_file(). (Could also use qsort(),
5103  // but it could allocate memory.)
5104  static void mz_zip_reader_sort_central_dir_offsets_by_filename(
5105  mz_zip_archive *pZip) {
5106  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
5107  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets = &pState->m_central_dir_offsets;
5108  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir = &pState->m_central_dir;
5109  mz_uint32 *pIndices = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5110  &pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, 0);
5111  const int size = pZip->m_total_files;
5112  int start = (size - 2) >> 1, end;
5113  while (start >= 0) {
5114  int child, root = start;
5115  for (;;) {
5116  if ((child = (root << 1) + 1) >= size) break;
5117  child +=
5118  (((child + 1) < size) &&
5119  (mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets,
5120  pIndices[child], pIndices[child + 1])));
5121  if (!mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets,
5122  pIndices[root], pIndices[child]))
5123  break;
5124  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[root], pIndices[child]);
5125  root = child;
5126  }
5127  start--;
5128  }
5129 
5130  end = size - 1;
5131  while (end > 0) {
5132  int child, root = 0;
5133  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[end], pIndices[0]);
5134  for (;;) {
5135  if ((child = (root << 1) + 1) >= end) break;
5136  child +=
5137  (((child + 1) < end) &&
5138  mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets,
5139  pIndices[child], pIndices[child + 1]));
5140  if (!mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets,
5141  pIndices[root], pIndices[child]))
5142  break;
5143  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[root], pIndices[child]);
5144  root = child;
5145  }
5146  end--;
5147  }
5148  }
5149 
5150  static mz_bool mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5151  mz_uint32 flags) {
5152  mz_uint cdir_size, num_this_disk, cdir_disk_index;
5153  mz_uint64 cdir_ofs;
5154  mz_int64 cur_file_ofs;
5155  const mz_uint8 *p;
5156  mz_uint32 buf_u32[4096 / sizeof(mz_uint32)];
5157  mz_uint8 *pBuf = (mz_uint8 *)buf_u32;
5158  mz_bool sort_central_dir =
5159  ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_DO_NOT_SORT_CENTRAL_DIRECTORY) == 0);
5160  // Basic sanity checks - reject files which are too small, and check the first
5161  // 4 bytes of the file to make sure a local header is there.
5162  if (pZip->m_archive_size < MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
5163  return MZ_FALSE;
5164  // Find the end of central directory record by scanning the file from the end
5165  // towards the beginning.
5166  cur_file_ofs =
5167  MZ_MAX((mz_int64)pZip->m_archive_size - (mz_int64)sizeof(buf_u32), 0);
5168  for (;;) {
5169  int i,
5170  n = (int)MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf_u32), pZip->m_archive_size - cur_file_ofs);
5171  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf, n) != (mz_uint)n)
5172  return MZ_FALSE;
5173  for (i = n - 4; i >= 0; --i)
5174  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + i) == MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG) break;
5175  if (i >= 0) {
5176  cur_file_ofs += i;
5177  break;
5178  }
5179  if ((!cur_file_ofs) || ((pZip->m_archive_size - cur_file_ofs) >=
5180  (0xFFFF + MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)))
5181  return MZ_FALSE;
5182  cur_file_ofs = MZ_MAX(cur_file_ofs - (sizeof(buf_u32) - 3), 0);
5183  }
5184  // Read and verify the end of central directory record.
5185  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf,
5186  MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) !=
5187  MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
5188  return MZ_FALSE;
5189  if ((MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_SIG_OFS) !=
5190  MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG) ||
5191  ((pZip->m_total_files =
5192  MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_TOTAL_ENTRIES_OFS)) !=
5193  MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_NUM_ENTRIES_ON_DISK_OFS)))
5194  return MZ_FALSE;
5195 
5196  num_this_disk = MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_THIS_DISK_OFS);
5197  cdir_disk_index = MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_DISK_CDIR_OFS);
5198  if (((num_this_disk | cdir_disk_index) != 0) &&
5199  ((num_this_disk != 1) || (cdir_disk_index != 1)))
5200  return MZ_FALSE;
5201 
5202  if ((cdir_size = MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_SIZE_OFS)) <
5203  pZip->m_total_files * MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
5204  return MZ_FALSE;
5205 
5206  cdir_ofs = MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_OFS_OFS);
5207  if ((cdir_ofs + (mz_uint64)cdir_size) > pZip->m_archive_size) return MZ_FALSE;
5208 
5209  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = cdir_ofs;
5210 
5211  if (pZip->m_total_files) {
5212  mz_uint i, n;
5213 
5214  // Read the entire central directory into a heap block, and allocate another
5215  // heap block to hold the unsorted central dir file record offsets, and
5216  // another to hold the sorted indices.
5217  if ((!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, cdir_size,
5218  MZ_FALSE)) ||
5219  (!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets,
5220  pZip->m_total_files, MZ_FALSE)))
5221  return MZ_FALSE;
5222 
5223  if (sort_central_dir) {
5224  if (!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip,
5225  &pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets,
5226  pZip->m_total_files, MZ_FALSE))
5227  return MZ_FALSE;
5228  }
5229 
5230  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cdir_ofs,
5231  pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p,
5232  cdir_size) != cdir_size)
5233  return MZ_FALSE;
5234 
5235  // Now create an index into the central directory file records, do some
5236  // basic sanity checking on each record, and check for zip64 entries (which
5237  // are not yet supported).
5238  p = (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p;
5239  for (n = cdir_size, i = 0; i < pZip->m_total_files; ++i) {
5240  mz_uint total_header_size, comp_size, decomp_size, disk_index;
5241  if ((n < MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) ||
5242  (MZ_READ_LE32(p) != MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG))
5243  return MZ_FALSE;
5244  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32,
5245  i) =
5246  (mz_uint32)(p - (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p);
5247  if (sort_central_dir)
5248  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets,
5249  mz_uint32, i) = i;
5250  comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5251  decomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5252  if (((!MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS)) &&
5253  (decomp_size != comp_size)) ||
5254  (decomp_size && !comp_size) || (decomp_size == 0xFFFFFFFF) ||
5255  (comp_size == 0xFFFFFFFF))
5256  return MZ_FALSE;
5257  disk_index = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DISK_START_OFS);
5258  if ((disk_index != num_this_disk) && (disk_index != 1)) return MZ_FALSE;
5259  if (((mz_uint64)MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS) +
5260  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
5261  return MZ_FALSE;
5262  if ((total_header_size = MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE +
5263  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) +
5264  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS) +
5265  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS)) >
5266  n)
5267  return MZ_FALSE;
5268  n -= total_header_size;
5269  p += total_header_size;
5270  }
5271  }
5272 
5273  if (sort_central_dir)
5274  mz_zip_reader_sort_central_dir_offsets_by_filename(pZip);
5275 
5276  return MZ_TRUE;
5277  }
5278 
5279  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint64 size,
5280  mz_uint32 flags) {
5281  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pRead)) return MZ_FALSE;
5282  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags)) return MZ_FALSE;
5283  pZip->m_archive_size = size;
5284  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags)) {
5285  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
5286  return MZ_FALSE;
5287  }
5288  return MZ_TRUE;
5289  }
5290 
5291  static size_t mz_zip_mem_read_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs,
5292  void *pBuf, size_t n) {
5293  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
5294  size_t s = (file_ofs >= pZip->m_archive_size)
5295  ? 0
5296  : (size_t)MZ_MIN(pZip->m_archive_size - file_ofs, n);
5297  memcpy(pBuf, (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + file_ofs, s);
5298  return s;
5299  }
5300 
5301  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const void *pMem,
5302  size_t size, mz_uint32 flags) {
5303  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags)) return MZ_FALSE;
5304  pZip->m_archive_size = size;
5305  pZip->m_pRead = mz_zip_mem_read_func;
5306  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
5307 #ifdef __cplusplus
5308  pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = const_cast<void *>(pMem);
5309 #else
5310  pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = (void *)pMem;
5311 #endif
5312  pZip->m_pState->m_mem_size = size;
5313  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags)) {
5314  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
5315  return MZ_FALSE;
5316  }
5317  return MZ_TRUE;
5318  }
5319 
5320 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
5321  static size_t mz_zip_file_read_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs,
5322  void *pBuf, size_t n) {
5323  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
5324  mz_int64 cur_ofs = MZ_FTELL64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
5325  if (((mz_int64)file_ofs < 0) ||
5326  (((cur_ofs != (mz_int64)file_ofs)) &&
5327  (MZ_FSEEK64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile, (mz_int64)file_ofs, SEEK_SET))))
5328  return 0;
5329  return MZ_FREAD(pBuf, 1, n, pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
5330  }
5331 
5332  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename,
5333  mz_uint32 flags) {
5334  mz_uint64 file_size;
5335  MZ_FILE *pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pFilename, "rb");
5336  if (!pFile) return MZ_FALSE;
5337  if (MZ_FSEEK64(pFile, 0, SEEK_END)) {
5338  MZ_FCLOSE(pFile);
5339  return MZ_FALSE;
5340  }
5341  file_size = MZ_FTELL64(pFile);
5342  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags)) {
5343  MZ_FCLOSE(pFile);
5344  return MZ_FALSE;
5345  }
5346  pZip->m_pRead = mz_zip_file_read_func;
5347  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
5348  pZip->m_pState->m_pFile = pFile;
5349  pZip->m_archive_size = file_size;
5350  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags)) {
5351  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
5352  return MZ_FALSE;
5353  }
5354  return MZ_TRUE;
5355  }
5356 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
5357 
5358  mz_uint mz_zip_reader_get_num_files(mz_zip_archive *pZip) {
5359  return pZip ? pZip->m_total_files : 0;
5360  }
5361 
5362  static MZ_FORCEINLINE const mz_uint8 *mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(
5363  mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index) {
5364  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (file_index >= pZip->m_total_files) ||
5365  (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
5366  return NULL;
5367  return &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5368  &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, mz_uint8,
5369  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32,
5370  file_index));
5371  }
5372 
5373  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_is_file_encrypted(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5374  mz_uint file_index) {
5375  mz_uint m_bit_flag;
5376  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
5377  if (!p) return MZ_FALSE;
5378  m_bit_flag = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS);
5379  return (m_bit_flag & 1);
5380  }
5381 
5382  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5383  mz_uint file_index) {
5384  mz_uint filename_len, external_attr;
5385  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
5386  if (!p) return MZ_FALSE;
5387 
5388  // First see if the filename ends with a '/' character.
5389  filename_len = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5390  if (filename_len) {
5391  if (*(p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + filename_len - 1) == '/')
5392  return MZ_TRUE;
5393  }
5394 
5395  // Bugfix: This code was also checking if the internal attribute was non-zero,
5396  // which wasn't correct.
5397  // Most/all zip writers (hopefully) set DOS file/directory attributes in the
5398  // low 16-bits, so check for the DOS directory flag and ignore the source OS
5399  // ID in the created by field.
5400  // FIXME: Remove this check? Is it necessary - we already check the filename.
5401  external_attr = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
5402  if ((external_attr & 0x10) != 0) return MZ_TRUE;
5403 
5404  return MZ_FALSE;
5405  }
5406 
5407  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_file_stat(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index,
5408  mz_zip_archive_file_stat *pStat) {
5409  mz_uint n;
5410  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
5411  if ((!p) || (!pStat)) return MZ_FALSE;
5412 
5413  // Unpack the central directory record.
5414  pStat->m_file_index = file_index;
5415  pStat->m_central_dir_ofs = MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5416  &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, file_index);
5417  pStat->m_version_made_by = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_MADE_BY_OFS);
5418  pStat->m_version_needed = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS);
5419  pStat->m_bit_flag = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS);
5420  pStat->m_method = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS);
5421 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5422  pStat->m_time =
5423  mz_zip_dos_to_time_t(MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_TIME_OFS),
5424  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_DATE_OFS));
5425 #endif
5426  pStat->m_crc32 = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_CRC32_OFS);
5427  pStat->m_comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5428  pStat->m_uncomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5429  pStat->m_internal_attr = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_INTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
5430  pStat->m_external_attr = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
5431  pStat->m_local_header_ofs = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS);
5432 
5433  // Copy as much of the filename and comment as possible.
5434  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5435  n = MZ_MIN(n, MZ_ZIP_MAX_ARCHIVE_FILENAME_SIZE - 1);
5436  memcpy(pStat->m_filename, p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE, n);
5437  pStat->m_filename[n] = '\0';
5438 
5439  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS);
5440  n = MZ_MIN(n, MZ_ZIP_MAX_ARCHIVE_FILE_COMMENT_SIZE - 1);
5441  pStat->m_comment_size = n;
5442  memcpy(pStat->m_comment,
5443  p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE +
5444  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) +
5445  MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS),
5446  n);
5447  pStat->m_comment[n] = '\0';
5448 
5449  return MZ_TRUE;
5450  }
5451 
5452  mz_uint mz_zip_reader_get_filename(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index,
5453  char *pFilename, mz_uint filename_buf_size) {
5454  mz_uint n;
5455  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
5456  if (!p) {
5457  if (filename_buf_size) pFilename[0] = '\0';
5458  return 0;
5459  }
5460  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5461  if (filename_buf_size) {
5462  n = MZ_MIN(n, filename_buf_size - 1);
5463  memcpy(pFilename, p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE, n);
5464  pFilename[n] = '\0';
5465  }
5466  return n + 1;
5467  }
5468 
5469  static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_reader_string_equal(const char *pA,
5470  const char *pB,
5471  mz_uint len,
5472  mz_uint flags) {
5473  mz_uint i;
5474  if (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_CASE_SENSITIVE) return 0 == memcmp(pA, pB, len);
5475  for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
5476  if (MZ_TOLOWER(pA[i]) != MZ_TOLOWER(pB[i])) return MZ_FALSE;
5477  return MZ_TRUE;
5478  }
5479 
5480  static MZ_FORCEINLINE int mz_zip_reader_filename_compare(
5481  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_array,
5482  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint l_index, const char *pR,
5483  mz_uint r_len) {
5484  const mz_uint8 *pL = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5485  pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8,
5486  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32,
5487  l_index)),
5488  *pE;
5489  mz_uint l_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pL + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5490  mz_uint8 l = 0, r = 0;
5491  pL += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
5492  pE = pL + MZ_MIN(l_len, r_len);
5493  while (pL < pE) {
5494  if ((l = MZ_TOLOWER(*pL)) != (r = MZ_TOLOWER(*pR))) break;
5495  pL++;
5496  pR++;
5497  }
5498  return (pL == pE) ? (int)(l_len - r_len) : (l - r);
5499  }
5500 
5501  static int mz_zip_reader_locate_file_binary_search(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5502  const char *pFilename) {
5503  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
5504  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets = &pState->m_central_dir_offsets;
5505  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir = &pState->m_central_dir;
5506  mz_uint32 *pIndices = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5507  &pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, 0);
5508  const int size = pZip->m_total_files;
5509  const mz_uint filename_len = (mz_uint)strlen(pFilename);
5510  int l = 0, h = size - 1;
5511  while (l <= h) {
5512  int m = (l + h) >> 1, file_index = pIndices[m],
5513  comp =
5514  mz_zip_reader_filename_compare(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets,
5515  file_index, pFilename, filename_len);
5516  if (!comp)
5517  return file_index;
5518  else if (comp < 0)
5519  l = m + 1;
5520  else
5521  h = m - 1;
5522  }
5523  return -1;
5524  }
5525 
5526  int mz_zip_reader_locate_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pName,
5527  const char *pComment, mz_uint flags) {
5528  mz_uint file_index;
5529  size_t name_len, comment_len;
5530  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pName) ||
5531  (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
5532  return -1;
5533  if (((flags & (MZ_ZIP_FLAG_IGNORE_PATH | MZ_ZIP_FLAG_CASE_SENSITIVE)) == 0) &&
5534  (!pComment) && (pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets.m_size))
5535  return mz_zip_reader_locate_file_binary_search(pZip, pName);
5536  name_len = strlen(pName);
5537  if (name_len > 0xFFFF) return -1;
5538  comment_len = pComment ? strlen(pComment) : 0;
5539  if (comment_len > 0xFFFF) return -1;
5540  for (file_index = 0; file_index < pZip->m_total_files; file_index++) {
5541  const mz_uint8 *pHeader = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(
5542  &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, mz_uint8,
5543  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32,
5544  file_index));
5545  mz_uint filename_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
5546  const char *pFilename =
5547  (const char *)pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
5548  if (filename_len < name_len) continue;
5549  if (comment_len) {
5550  mz_uint file_extra_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS),
5551  file_comment_len =
5552  MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS);
5553  const char *pFile_comment = pFilename + filename_len + file_extra_len;
5554  if ((file_comment_len != comment_len) ||
5555  (!mz_zip_reader_string_equal(pComment, pFile_comment,
5556  file_comment_len, flags)))
5557  continue;
5558  }
5559  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_IGNORE_PATH) && (filename_len)) {
5560  int ofs = filename_len - 1;
5561  do {
5562  if ((pFilename[ofs] == '/') || (pFilename[ofs] == '\\') ||
5563  (pFilename[ofs] == ':'))
5564  break;
5565  } while (--ofs >= 0);
5566  ofs++;
5567  pFilename += ofs;
5568  filename_len -= ofs;
5569  }
5570  if ((filename_len == name_len) &&
5571  (mz_zip_reader_string_equal(pName, pFilename, filename_len, flags)))
5572  return file_index;
5573  }
5574  return -1;
5575  }
5576 
5577  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5578  mz_uint file_index, void *pBuf,
5579  size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags,
5580  void *pUser_read_buf,
5581  size_t user_read_buf_size) {
5582  int status = TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
5583  mz_uint64 needed_size, cur_file_ofs, comp_remaining,
5584  out_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_size, read_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_avail;
5585  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
5586  void *pRead_buf;
5587  mz_uint32
5588  local_header_u32[(MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(mz_uint32) - 1) /
5589  sizeof(mz_uint32)];
5590  mz_uint8 *pLocal_header = (mz_uint8 *)local_header_u32;
5591  tinfl_decompressor inflator;
5592 
5593  if ((buf_size) && (!pBuf)) return MZ_FALSE;
5594 
5595  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat)) return MZ_FALSE;
5596 
5597  // Empty file, or a directory (but not always a directory - I've seen odd zips
5598  // with directories that have compressed data which inflates to 0 bytes)
5599  if (!file_stat.m_comp_size) return MZ_TRUE;
5600 
5601  // Entry is a subdirectory (I've seen old zips with dir entries which have
5602  // compressed deflate data which inflates to 0 bytes, but these entries claim
5603  // to uncompress to 512 bytes in the headers).
5604  // I'm torn how to handle this case - should it fail instead?
5605  if (mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(pZip, file_index)) return MZ_TRUE;
5606 
5607  // Encryption and patch files are not supported.
5608  if (file_stat.m_bit_flag & (1 | 32)) return MZ_FALSE;
5609 
5610  // This function only supports stored and deflate.
5611  if ((!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)) && (file_stat.m_method != 0) &&
5612  (file_stat.m_method != MZ_DEFLATED))
5613  return MZ_FALSE;
5614 
5615  // Ensure supplied output buffer is large enough.
5616  needed_size = (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) ? file_stat.m_comp_size
5617  : file_stat.m_uncomp_size;
5618  if (buf_size < needed_size) return MZ_FALSE;
5619 
5620  // Read and parse the local directory entry.
5621  cur_file_ofs = file_stat.m_local_header_ofs;
5622  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pLocal_header,
5623  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) !=
5624  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
5625  return MZ_FALSE;
5626  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pLocal_header) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
5627  return MZ_FALSE;
5628 
5629  cur_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE +
5630  MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) +
5631  MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS);
5632  if ((cur_file_ofs + file_stat.m_comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
5633  return MZ_FALSE;
5634 
5635  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) || (!file_stat.m_method)) {
5636  // The file is stored or the caller has requested the compressed data.
5637  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf,
5638  (size_t)needed_size) != needed_size)
5639  return MZ_FALSE;
5640  return ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) != 0) ||
5641  (mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, (const mz_uint8 *)pBuf,
5642  (size_t)file_stat.m_uncomp_size) == file_stat.m_crc32);
5643  }
5644 
5645  // Decompress the file either directly from memory or from a file input
5646  // buffer.
5647  tinfl_init(&inflator);
5648 
5649  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) {
5650  // Read directly from the archive in memory.
5651  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + cur_file_ofs;
5652  read_buf_size = read_buf_avail = file_stat.m_comp_size;
5653  comp_remaining = 0;
5654  }
5655  else if (pUser_read_buf) {
5656  // Use a user provided read buffer.
5657  if (!user_read_buf_size) return MZ_FALSE;
5658  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pUser_read_buf;
5659  read_buf_size = user_read_buf_size;
5660  read_buf_avail = 0;
5661  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
5662  }
5663  else {
5664  // Temporarily allocate a read buffer.
5665  read_buf_size =
5666  MZ_MIN(file_stat.m_comp_size, (mz_uint)MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
5667 #ifdef _MSC_VER
5668  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) &&
5669  (read_buf_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
5670 #else
5671  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (read_buf_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
5672 #endif
5673  return MZ_FALSE;
5674  if (NULL == (pRead_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1,
5675  (size_t)read_buf_size)))
5676  return MZ_FALSE;
5677  read_buf_avail = 0;
5678  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
5679  }
5680 
5681  do {
5682  size_t in_buf_size,
5683  out_buf_size = (size_t)(file_stat.m_uncomp_size - out_buf_ofs);
5684  if ((!read_buf_avail) && (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)) {
5685  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
5686  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf,
5687  (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail) {
5688  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5689  break;
5690  }
5691  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
5692  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
5693  read_buf_ofs = 0;
5694  }
5695  in_buf_size = (size_t)read_buf_avail;
5696  status = tinfl_decompress(
5697  &inflator, (mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf + read_buf_ofs, &in_buf_size,
5698  (mz_uint8 *)pBuf, (mz_uint8 *)pBuf + out_buf_ofs, &out_buf_size,
5699  TINFL_FLAG_USING_NON_WRAPPING_OUTPUT_BUF |
5700  (comp_remaining ? TINFL_FLAG_HAS_MORE_INPUT : 0));
5701  read_buf_avail -= in_buf_size;
5702  read_buf_ofs += in_buf_size;
5703  out_buf_ofs += out_buf_size;
5704  } while (status == TINFL_STATUS_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT);
5705 
5706  if (status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE) {
5707  // Make sure the entire file was decompressed, and check its CRC.
5708  if ((out_buf_ofs != file_stat.m_uncomp_size) ||
5709  (mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, (const mz_uint8 *)pBuf,
5710  (size_t)file_stat.m_uncomp_size) != file_stat.m_crc32))
5711  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5712  }
5713 
5714  if ((!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) && (!pUser_read_buf))
5715  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
5716 
5717  return status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
5718  }
5719 
5720  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem_no_alloc(
5721  mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, void *pBuf, size_t buf_size,
5722  mz_uint flags, void *pUser_read_buf, size_t user_read_buf_size) {
5723  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
5724  if (file_index < 0) return MZ_FALSE;
5725  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, file_index, pBuf, buf_size,
5726  flags, pUser_read_buf,
5727  user_read_buf_size);
5728  }
5729 
5730  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index,
5731  void *pBuf, size_t buf_size,
5732  mz_uint flags) {
5733  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, file_index, pBuf, buf_size,
5734  flags, NULL, 0);
5735  }
5736 
5737  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5738  const char *pFilename, void *pBuf,
5739  size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags) {
5740  return mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, pFilename, pBuf,
5741  buf_size, flags, NULL, 0);
5742  }
5743 
5744  void *mz_zip_reader_extract_to_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index,
5745  size_t *pSize, mz_uint flags) {
5746  mz_uint64 comp_size, uncomp_size, alloc_size;
5747  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
5748  void *pBuf;
5749 
5750  if (pSize) *pSize = 0;
5751  if (!p) return NULL;
5752 
5753  comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5754  uncomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
5755 
5756  alloc_size = (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) ? comp_size : uncomp_size;
5757 #ifdef _MSC_VER
5758  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (alloc_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
5759 #else
5760  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (alloc_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
5761 #endif
5762  return NULL;
5763  if (NULL ==
5764  (pBuf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, (size_t)alloc_size)))
5765  return NULL;
5766 
5767  if (!mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem(pZip, file_index, pBuf, (size_t)alloc_size,
5768  flags)) {
5769  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
5770  return NULL;
5771  }
5772 
5773  if (pSize) *pSize = (size_t)alloc_size;
5774  return pBuf;
5775  }
5776 
5777  void *mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5778  const char *pFilename, size_t *pSize,
5779  mz_uint flags) {
5780  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
5781  if (file_index < 0) {
5782  if (pSize) *pSize = 0;
5783  return MZ_FALSE;
5784  }
5785  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_heap(pZip, file_index, pSize, flags);
5786  }
5787 
5788  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5789  mz_uint file_index,
5790  mz_file_write_func pCallback,
5791  void *pOpaque, mz_uint flags) {
5792  int status = TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
5793  mz_uint file_crc32 = MZ_CRC32_INIT;
5794  mz_uint64 read_buf_size, read_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_avail, comp_remaining,
5795  out_buf_ofs = 0, cur_file_ofs;
5796  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
5797  void *pRead_buf = NULL;
5798  void *pWrite_buf = NULL;
5799  mz_uint32
5800  local_header_u32[(MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(mz_uint32) - 1) /
5801  sizeof(mz_uint32)];
5802  mz_uint8 *pLocal_header = (mz_uint8 *)local_header_u32;
5803 
5804  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat)) return MZ_FALSE;
5805 
5806  // Empty file, or a directory (but not always a directory - I've seen odd zips
5807  // with directories that have compressed data which inflates to 0 bytes)
5808  if (!file_stat.m_comp_size) return MZ_TRUE;
5809 
5810  // Entry is a subdirectory (I've seen old zips with dir entries which have
5811  // compressed deflate data which inflates to 0 bytes, but these entries claim
5812  // to uncompress to 512 bytes in the headers).
5813  // I'm torn how to handle this case - should it fail instead?
5814  if (mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(pZip, file_index)) return MZ_TRUE;
5815 
5816  // Encryption and patch files are not supported.
5817  if (file_stat.m_bit_flag & (1 | 32)) return MZ_FALSE;
5818 
5819  // This function only supports stored and deflate.
5820  if ((!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)) && (file_stat.m_method != 0) &&
5821  (file_stat.m_method != MZ_DEFLATED))
5822  return MZ_FALSE;
5823 
5824  // Read and parse the local directory entry.
5825  cur_file_ofs = file_stat.m_local_header_ofs;
5826  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pLocal_header,
5827  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) !=
5828  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
5829  return MZ_FALSE;
5830  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pLocal_header) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
5831  return MZ_FALSE;
5832 
5833  cur_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE +
5834  MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) +
5835  MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS);
5836  if ((cur_file_ofs + file_stat.m_comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
5837  return MZ_FALSE;
5838 
5839  // Decompress the file either directly from memory or from a file input
5840  // buffer.
5841  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) {
5842  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + cur_file_ofs;
5843  read_buf_size = read_buf_avail = file_stat.m_comp_size;
5844  comp_remaining = 0;
5845  }
5846  else {
5847  read_buf_size =
5848  MZ_MIN(file_stat.m_comp_size, (mz_uint)MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
5849  if (NULL == (pRead_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1,
5850  (size_t)read_buf_size)))
5851  return MZ_FALSE;
5852  read_buf_avail = 0;
5853  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
5854  }
5855 
5856  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) || (!file_stat.m_method)) {
5857  // The file is stored or the caller has requested the compressed data.
5858  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) {
5859 #ifdef _MSC_VER
5860  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) &&
5861  (file_stat.m_comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF))
5862 #else
5863  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) &&
5864  (file_stat.m_comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF))
5865 #endif
5866  return MZ_FALSE;
5867  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pRead_buf,
5868  (size_t)file_stat.m_comp_size) != file_stat.m_comp_size)
5869  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5870  else if (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))
5871  file_crc32 =
5872  (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(file_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf,
5873  (size_t)file_stat.m_comp_size);
5874  cur_file_ofs += file_stat.m_comp_size;
5875  out_buf_ofs += file_stat.m_comp_size;
5876  comp_remaining = 0;
5877  }
5878  else {
5879  while (comp_remaining) {
5880  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
5881  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf,
5882  (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail) {
5883  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5884  break;
5885  }
5886 
5887  if (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))
5888  file_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(
5889  file_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail);
5890 
5891  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pRead_buf,
5892  (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail) {
5893  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5894  break;
5895  }
5896  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
5897  out_buf_ofs += read_buf_avail;
5898  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
5899  }
5900  }
5901  }
5902  else {
5903  tinfl_decompressor inflator;
5904  tinfl_init(&inflator);
5905 
5906  if (NULL == (pWrite_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1,
5907  TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE)))
5908  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5909  else {
5910  do {
5911  mz_uint8 *pWrite_buf_cur =
5912  (mz_uint8 *)pWrite_buf + (out_buf_ofs & (TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - 1));
5913  size_t in_buf_size,
5914  out_buf_size =
5915  TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - (out_buf_ofs & (TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - 1));
5916  if ((!read_buf_avail) && (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)) {
5917  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
5918  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf,
5919  (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail) {
5920  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5921  break;
5922  }
5923  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
5924  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
5925  read_buf_ofs = 0;
5926  }
5927 
5928  in_buf_size = (size_t)read_buf_avail;
5929  status = tinfl_decompress(
5930  &inflator, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf + read_buf_ofs, &in_buf_size,
5931  (mz_uint8 *)pWrite_buf, pWrite_buf_cur, &out_buf_size,
5932  comp_remaining ? TINFL_FLAG_HAS_MORE_INPUT : 0);
5933  read_buf_avail -= in_buf_size;
5934  read_buf_ofs += in_buf_size;
5935 
5936  if (out_buf_size) {
5937  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pWrite_buf_cur, out_buf_size) !=
5938  out_buf_size) {
5939  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5940  break;
5941  }
5942  file_crc32 =
5943  (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(file_crc32, pWrite_buf_cur, out_buf_size);
5944  if ((out_buf_ofs += out_buf_size) > file_stat.m_uncomp_size) {
5945  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5946  break;
5947  }
5948  }
5949  } while ((status == TINFL_STATUS_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT) ||
5950  (status == TINFL_STATUS_HAS_MORE_OUTPUT));
5951  }
5952  }
5953 
5954  if ((status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE) &&
5955  (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))) {
5956  // Make sure the entire file was decompressed, and check its CRC.
5957  if ((out_buf_ofs != file_stat.m_uncomp_size) ||
5958  (file_crc32 != file_stat.m_crc32))
5959  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
5960  }
5961 
5962  if (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
5963  if (pWrite_buf) pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pWrite_buf);
5964 
5965  return status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
5966  }
5967 
5968  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_callback(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
5969  const char *pFilename,
5970  mz_file_write_func pCallback,
5971  void *pOpaque, mz_uint flags) {
5972  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
5973  if (file_index < 0) return MZ_FALSE;
5974  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(pZip, file_index, pCallback, pOpaque,
5975  flags);
5976  }
5977 
5978 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
5979  static size_t mz_zip_file_write_callback(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 ofs,
5980  const void *pBuf, size_t n) {
5981  (void)ofs;
5982  return MZ_FWRITE(pBuf, 1, n, (MZ_FILE *)pOpaque);
5983  }
5984 
5985  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index,
5986  const char *pDst_filename,
5987  mz_uint flags) {
5988  mz_bool status;
5989  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
5990  MZ_FILE *pFile;
5991  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat)) return MZ_FALSE;
5992  pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pDst_filename, "wb");
5993  if (!pFile) return MZ_FALSE;
5994  status = mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(
5995  pZip, file_index, mz_zip_file_write_callback, pFile, flags);
5996  if (MZ_FCLOSE(pFile) == EOF) return MZ_FALSE;
5997 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
5998  if (status)
5999  mz_zip_set_file_times(pDst_filename, file_stat.m_time, file_stat.m_time);
6000 #endif
6001  return status;
6002  }
6003 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6004 
6005  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_end(mz_zip_archive *pZip) {
6006  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pZip->m_pAlloc) || (!pZip->m_pFree) ||
6007  (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
6008  return MZ_FALSE;
6009 
6010  if (pZip->m_pState) {
6011  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
6012  pZip->m_pState = NULL;
6013  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir);
6014  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets);
6015  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets);
6016 
6017 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6018  if (pState->m_pFile) {
6019  MZ_FCLOSE(pState->m_pFile);
6020  pState->m_pFile = NULL;
6021  }
6022 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6023 
6024  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState);
6025  }
6026  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID;
6027 
6028  return MZ_TRUE;
6029  }
6030 
6031 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6032  mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
6033  const char *pArchive_filename,
6034  const char *pDst_filename,
6035  mz_uint flags) {
6036  int file_index =
6037  mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pArchive_filename, NULL, flags);
6038  if (file_index < 0) return MZ_FALSE;
6039  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_file(pZip, file_index, pDst_filename, flags);
6040  }
6041 #endif
6042 
6043  // ------------------- .ZIP archive writing
6044 
6045 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ARCHIVE_WRITING_APIS
6046 
6047  static void mz_write_le16(mz_uint8 *p, mz_uint16 v) {
6048  p[0] = (mz_uint8)v;
6049  p[1] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 8);
6050  }
6051  static void mz_write_le32(mz_uint8 *p, mz_uint32 v) {
6052  p[0] = (mz_uint8)v;
6053  p[1] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 8);
6054  p[2] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 16);
6055  p[3] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 24);
6056  }
6057 #define MZ_WRITE_LE16(p, v) mz_write_le16((mz_uint8 *)(p), (mz_uint16)(v))
6058 #define MZ_WRITE_LE32(p, v) mz_write_le32((mz_uint8 *)(p), (mz_uint32)(v))
6059 
6060  mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint64 existing_size) {
6061  if ((!pZip) || (pZip->m_pState) || (!pZip->m_pWrite) ||
6062  (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID))
6063  return MZ_FALSE;
6064 
6065  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment) {
6066  // Ensure user specified file offset alignment is a power of 2.
6067  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1))
6068  return MZ_FALSE;
6069  }
6070 
6071  if (!pZip->m_pAlloc) pZip->m_pAlloc = def_alloc_func;
6072  if (!pZip->m_pFree) pZip->m_pFree = def_free_func;
6073  if (!pZip->m_pRealloc) pZip->m_pRealloc = def_realloc_func;
6074 
6075  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING;
6076  pZip->m_archive_size = existing_size;
6077  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
6078  pZip->m_total_files = 0;
6079 
6080  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState = (mz_zip_internal_state *)pZip->m_pAlloc(
6081  pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state))))
6082  return MZ_FALSE;
6083  memset(pZip->m_pState, 0, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state));
6084  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir,
6085  sizeof(mz_uint8));
6086  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets,
6087  sizeof(mz_uint32));
6088  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets,
6089  sizeof(mz_uint32));
6090  return MZ_TRUE;
6091  }
6092 
6093  static size_t mz_zip_heap_write_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs,
6094  const void *pBuf, size_t n) {
6095  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
6096  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
6097  mz_uint64 new_size = MZ_MAX(file_ofs + n, pState->m_mem_size);
6098 #ifdef _MSC_VER
6099  if ((!n) ||
6100  ((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32)) && (new_size > 0x7FFFFFFF)))
6101 #else
6102  if ((!n) ||
6103  ((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32)) && (new_size > 0x7FFFFFFF)))
6104 #endif
6105  return 0;
6106  if (new_size > pState->m_mem_capacity) {
6107  void *pNew_block;
6108  size_t new_capacity = MZ_MAX(64, pState->m_mem_capacity);
6109  while (new_capacity < new_size) new_capacity *= 2;
6110  if (NULL == (pNew_block = pZip->m_pRealloc(
6111  pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState->m_pMem, 1, new_capacity)))
6112  return 0;
6113  pState->m_pMem = pNew_block;
6114  pState->m_mem_capacity = new_capacity;
6115  }
6116  memcpy((mz_uint8 *)pState->m_pMem + file_ofs, pBuf, n);
6117  pState->m_mem_size = (size_t)new_size;
6118  return n;
6119  }
6120 
6121  mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
6122  size_t size_to_reserve_at_beginning,
6123  size_t initial_allocation_size) {
6124  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_heap_write_func;
6125  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
6126  if (!mz_zip_writer_init(pZip, size_to_reserve_at_beginning)) return MZ_FALSE;
6127  if (0 != (initial_allocation_size = MZ_MAX(initial_allocation_size,
6128  size_to_reserve_at_beginning))) {
6129  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = pZip->m_pAlloc(
6130  pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, initial_allocation_size))) {
6131  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
6132  return MZ_FALSE;
6133  }
6134  pZip->m_pState->m_mem_capacity = initial_allocation_size;
6135  }
6136  return MZ_TRUE;
6137  }
6138 
6139 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6140  static size_t mz_zip_file_write_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs,
6141  const void *pBuf, size_t n) {
6142  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
6143  mz_int64 cur_ofs = MZ_FTELL64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
6144  if (((mz_int64)file_ofs < 0) ||
6145  (((cur_ofs != (mz_int64)file_ofs)) &&
6146  (MZ_FSEEK64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile, (mz_int64)file_ofs, SEEK_SET))))
6147  return 0;
6148  return MZ_FWRITE(pBuf, 1, n, pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
6149  }
6150 
6151  mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename,
6152  mz_uint64 size_to_reserve_at_beginning) {
6153  MZ_FILE *pFile;
6154  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_file_write_func;
6155  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
6156  if (!mz_zip_writer_init(pZip, size_to_reserve_at_beginning)) return MZ_FALSE;
6157  if (NULL == (pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pFilename, "wb"))) {
6158  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
6159  return MZ_FALSE;
6160  }
6161  pZip->m_pState->m_pFile = pFile;
6162  if (size_to_reserve_at_beginning) {
6163  mz_uint64 cur_ofs = 0;
6164  char buf[4096];
6165  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(buf);
6166  do {
6167  size_t n = (size_t)MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf), size_to_reserve_at_beginning);
6168  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_ofs, buf, n) != n) {
6169  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
6170  return MZ_FALSE;
6171  }
6172  cur_ofs += n;
6173  size_to_reserve_at_beginning -= n;
6174  } while (size_to_reserve_at_beginning);
6175  }
6176  return MZ_TRUE;
6177  }
6178 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6179 
6180  mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_from_reader(mz_zip_archive *pZip,
6181  const char *pFilename) {
6182  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
6183  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
6184  return MZ_FALSE;
6185  // No sense in trying to write to an archive that's already at the support max
6186  // size
6187  if ((pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) ||
6188  ((pZip->m_archive_size + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE +
6189  MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
6190  return MZ_FALSE;
6191 
6192  pState = pZip->m_pState;
6193 
6194  if (pState->m_pFile) {
6195 #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6196  pFilename;
6197  return MZ_FALSE;
6198 #else
6199  // Archive is being read from stdio - try to reopen as writable.
6200  if (pZip->m_pIO_opaque != pZip) return MZ_FALSE;
6201  if (!pFilename) return MZ_FALSE;
6202  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_file_write_func;
6203  if (NULL ==
6204  (pState->m_pFile = MZ_FREOPEN(pFilename, "r+b", pState->m_pFile))) {
6205  // The mz_zip_archive is now in a bogus state because pState->m_pFile is
6206  // NULL, so just close it.
6207  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
6208  return MZ_FALSE;
6209  }
6210 #endif // #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
6211  }
6212  else if (pState->m_pMem) {
6213  // Archive lives in a memory block. Assume it's from the heap that we can
6214  // resize using the realloc callback.
6215  if (pZip->m_pIO_opaque != pZip) return MZ_FALSE;
6216  pState->m_mem_capacity = pState->m_mem_size;
6217  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_heap_write_func;
6218  }
6219  // Archive is being read via a user provided read function - make sure the
6220  // user has specified a write function too.
6221  else if (!pZip->m_pWrite)
6222  return MZ_FALSE;
6223 
6224  // Start writing new files at the archive's current central directory
6225  // location.
6226  pZip->m_archive_size = pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs;
6227  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING;
6228  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
6229 
6230  return MZ_TRUE;
6231  }
6232 
6233  mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pArchive_name,
6234  const void *pBuf, size_t buf_size,
6235  mz_uint level_and_flags) {
6236  return mz_zip_writer_add_mem_ex(pZip, pArchive_name, pBuf, buf_size, NULL, 0,
6237  level_and_flags, 0, 0);
6238  }
6239 
6240  typedef struct {
6241  mz_zip_archive *m_pZip;
6242  mz_uint64 m_cur_archive_file_ofs;
6243  mz_uint64 m_comp_size;
6244  } mz_zip_writer_add_state;
6245 
6246  static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_put_buf_callback(const void *pBuf, int len,
6247  void *pUser) {
6248  mz_zip_writer_add_state *pState = (mz_zip_writer_add_state *)pUser;
6249  if ((int)pState->m_pZip->m_pWrite(pState->m_pZip->m_pIO_opaque,
6250  pState->m_cur_archive_file_ofs, pBuf,
6251  len) != len)
6252  return MZ_FALSE;
6253  pState->m_cur_archive_file_ofs += len;
6254  pState->m_comp_size += len;
6255  return MZ_TRUE;
6256  }
6257 
6258  static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_create_local_dir_header(
6259  mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint8 *pDst, mz_uint16 filename_size,
6260  mz_uint16 extra_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint64 comp_size,
6261  mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method, mz_uint16 bit_flags,
6262  mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date) {
6263  (void)pZip;
6264  memset(pDst, 0, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE);
6265  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_SIG_OFS, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG);
6266  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS, method ? 20 : 0);
6267  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS, bit_flags);
6268  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_METHOD_OFS, method);
6269  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_TIME_OFS, dos_time);
6270  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_DATE_OFS, dos_date);
6271  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_CRC32_OFS, uncomp_crc32);
6272  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, comp_size);
6273  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, uncomp_size);
6274  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS, filename_size);
6275  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS, extra_size);
6276  return MZ_TRUE;
6277  }
6278 
6279  static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_create_central_dir_header(
6280  mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint8 *pDst, mz_uint16 filename_size,
6281  mz_uint16 extra_size, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size,
6282  mz_uint64 comp_size, mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method,
6283  mz_uint16 bit_flags, mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date,
6284  mz_uint64 local_header_ofs, mz_uint32 ext_attributes) {
6285  (void)pZip;
6286  memset(pDst, 0, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE);
6287  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_SIG_OFS, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG);
6288  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS, method ? 20 : 0);
6289  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS, bit_flags);
6290  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS, method);
6291  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_TIME_OFS, dos_time);
6292  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_DATE_OFS, dos_date);
6293  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_CRC32_OFS, uncomp_crc32);
6294  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, comp_size);
6295  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, uncomp_size);
6296  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS, filename_size);
6297  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS, extra_size);
6298  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS, comment_size);
6299  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS, ext_attributes);
6300  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS, local_header_ofs);
6301  return MZ_TRUE;
6302  }
6303 
6304  static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_to_central_dir(
6305  mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, mz_uint16 filename_size,
6306  const void *pExtra, mz_uint16 extra_size, const void *pComment,
6307  mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint64 comp_size,
6308  mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method, mz_uint16 bit_flags,
6309  mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date, mz_uint64 local_header_ofs,
6310  mz_uint32 ext_attributes) {
6311  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
6312  mz_uint32 central_dir_ofs = (mz_uint32)pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
6313  size_t orig_central_dir_size = pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
6314  mz_uint8 central_dir_header[MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
6315 
6316  // No zip64 support yet
6317  if ((local_header_ofs > 0xFFFFFFFF) ||
6318  (((mz_uint64)pState->m_central_dir.m_size +
6319  MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + filename_size + extra_size +
6320  comment_size) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
6321  return MZ_FALSE;
6322 
6323  if (!mz_zip_writer_create_central_dir_header(
6324  pZip, central_dir_header, filename_size, extra_size, comment_size,
6325  uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, bit_flags, dos_time,
6326  dos_date, local_header_ofs, ext_attributes))
6327  return MZ_FALSE;
6328 
6329  if ((!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, central_dir_header,
6330  MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)) ||
6331  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pFilename,
6332  filename_size)) ||
6333  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pExtra,
6334  extra_size)) ||
6335  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pComment,
6336  comment_size)) ||
6337  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets,
6338  &central_dir_ofs, 1))) {
6339  // Try to push the central directory array back into its original state.
6340  mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, orig_central_dir_size,
6341  MZ_FALSE);
6342  return MZ_FALSE;
6343  }
6344 
6345  return MZ_TRUE;
6346  }
6347 
6348  static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_validate_archive_name(const char *pArchive_name) {
6349  // Basic ZIP archive filename validity checks: Valid filenames cannot start
6350  // with a forward slash, cannot contain a drive letter, and cannot use
6351  // DOS-style backward slashes.
6352  if (*pArchive_name == '/') return MZ_FALSE;
6353  while (*pArchive_name) {
6354  if ((*pArchive_name == '\\') || (*pArchive_name == ':')) return MZ_FALSE;
6355  pArchive_name++;
6356  }
6357  return MZ_TRUE;
6358  }
6359 
6360  static mz_uint mz_zip_writer_compute_padding_needed_for_file_alignment(
6361  mz_zip_archive *pZip) {
6362  mz_uint32 n;
6363  if (!pZip->m_file_offset_alignment) return 0;
6364  n = (mz_uint32)(pZip->m_archive_size & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1));
6365  return (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - n) &
